author: pll
msg: Now uses the latest PDF/HTML version from red-bean.
copies images for html version to correct location.

author: philip
msg: Fix issue 1496 by correcting a path used when switch/update deletes
items, I'm a little surprised the old code worked as well as it did!
(delete_entry): Construct full path from basename of path parameter.

author: cmpilato
msg: Some 'svn status' code cleanups (knocking out some TODOs and such),
(send_status_structure): Explain the unexplained arguments, and fix
(add_unversioned_items): Remove.  This functionality is now merged
(handle_dir_entry): New helper, with code cored from get_dir_status().
(get_dir_status): Add 'entry' argument and supporting code.  Update
call to send_unversioned_item().  Also, fix up the docstring for

author: cmpilato
msg: More streamy-status fixes.  All tests pass now (but this is not to be
taken to mean anything other than "we don't have superb test coverage").
(add_unversioned_items): Oops.  Build the right status path.
(close_edit): Use the right access baton for the job, and handle
(svn_client_status): Do some fancy anchor/target adm_access footwork.

author: philip
msg: Add an XFail regression test for a failed 'svn switch'.
